description: This Python script defines a workflow for personalized B2B email outreach, including classes for company data modeling, agents for website analysis and email generation, caching mechanisms, and a main execution function to run the workflow with storage and response handling.

classes.name: CompanyInfo
classes.description: Data model for storing detailed information about a company gathered during research, including business, technical, market, and contact details.

classes.name: PersonalisedEmailGenerator
classes.description: Workflow class orchestrating the process of researching companies, generating personalized emails, caching results, and managing the overall outreach process.

methods.name: get_cached_company_data
methods.description: Retrieve cached company research data from session state.

methods.name: cache_company_data
methods.description: Cache company research data into session state.

methods.name: get_cached_email
methods.description: Retrieve cached email content for a company.

methods.name: cache_email
methods.description: Cache generated email content for a company.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main method to execute the research and email generation workflow for each lead, utilizing caching and agents.
